bio: Amid the alchemical wonders of Arcadia's Cauldron, I am Fulmine Kriegheit, a Breton, standing as a sword and shield paladin. The cauldron's mystical aura fuels my dedication to righteousness, and with a background steeped in Breton traditions, I strive to embody the noble ideals of chivalry. In this bustling alchemy hub, my skills as a defender and protector are put to the test against the dangers that lurk within the enchanting city of Whiterun.
name: Fulmine Kriegheit
